network.param.modules.person.vendor

Class VendorManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.param.AbstModuleManager
      • network.param.AbstUploadModuleManager
        • network.param.modules.person.vendor.VendorManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBulkImport, IVendorManager

    public final class VendorManager
extends AbstUploadModuleManager
implements IVendorManager
    Implementation of IVendorManager, to perform vendor related operations into the ParamNetwork.

    IVendorManager addRecords/updateRecords/add/invite/edit/get/getAll vendors from the ParamNetwork. Using NetworkManager can able to access this reference.

    IInventoryManager catalogueManager = networkManager.getVendorManager();
    Want to perform any bulk upload items to implement this interface IBulkImport interface for remote files, for local files use FileBulkFileImportConfig. VendorManager defines below categories of operations:

    • addVendor method for add vendor object into ParamNetwork

    • inviteVendor method for inviting vendor into ParamNetwork

    • getAllVendors method for getting all te vendor IDs from ParamNetwork

    • addTemplate method for adding templates from ParamNetwork

    • getTemplate method for getting vendor template from ParamNetwork

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jitendra Kumar Balla, ParamNetwork

    • Method Detail

      • addRecords

        public void addRecords(IBulkFileImportConfig uploadConfig)
                throws InvalidConfigException,
                       FileNotFoundException,
                       NetworkException,
                       AccessDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: IBulkImport
        Method import all the records from external file source to ParamNetwork.

        #addRecords(IBulkFileUploadConfig) <i>addRecords</i> method will read the file stream, then it will validate below items

        • Original file size with Steam bytes size
        • Validate file format with Param prescribed format
        • Record mandatory fields.
        If everything is valid, then it will add new record to param network, Otherwise it will throw an error.
        Specified by:
        addRecords in interface IBulkImport
        Parameters:
        uploadConfig - Upload config like, getFileContent(),File name,size, etc..,
        Throws:
        InvalidConfigException - If any file format is wrong then it will throw InvalidConfigException
        FileNotFoundException - Unable to read the content from the stream, then it will throw FileNotFoundException
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will throw exception.
        AccessDeniedException - Not having enough access rights then it will throw an error

      • updateRecords

        public void updateRecords(IBulkFileImportConfig uploadConfig)
                   throws InvalidConfigException,
                          FileNotFoundException,
                          NetworkException,
                          AccessDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: IBulkImport
        Method update all the records from external file source to ParamNetwork.

        #updateRecords(IBulkFileUploadConfig) <i>updateRecords</i> method will read the file stream, then it will validate below items

        • Original file size with Steam bytes size
        • Validate file format with Param prescribed format
        • Record mandatory fields.
        • Record exists in the param network and having enough updates rights
        If everything is valid, then it will update record to param network, Otherwise it will throw an error.
        Specified by:
        updateRecords in interface IBulkImport
        Parameters:
        uploadConfig - Upload config like, getFileContent(),File name,size, etc..,
        Throws:
        InvalidConfigException - If any file format is wrong then it will throw InvalidConfigException
        FileNotFoundException - Unable to read the content from the stream, then it will throw FileNotFoundException
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will throw exception.
        AccessDeniedException - Not having enough access rights then it will throw an error

      • inviteVendor

        public void inviteVendor(IPersonTemplate vendorTemplate,
                         IVendor vendor)
                  throws TemplateNotFoundException,
                         InvalidConfigException,
                         NetworkException
        Description copied from interface: IVendorManager
        Method send invitation to vendor.

        Method will send invitation to vendor, it excepts ParamID or emailID. If paramID or Email is null it will throw InvalidConfigException and If template is not found it will throw IPersonTemplate exception, Otherwise it will send invitation to vendor.

        Specified by:
        inviteVendor in interface IVendorManager
        Parameters:
        vendorTemplate - Vendor template Object.
        vendor - invitation will be send to Vendor emailID/ParamID
        Throws:
        TemplateNotFoundException - If given template not found it will throw TemplateNotFoundException
        InvalidConfigException - If EmailID/ParamID is missing it will throw InvalidConfigException
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.

        Method add vendor for a given template.

        addVendor(String, IVendor) add new vendor if template is exists in the network and having enough access rights and all vendor data is filled, Otherwise it will throw an error.
